title: Unable to comment in PBE Boards (I own a PBE account)
body: Every time I try to comment it says to log in to comment. I log in and the message is still there. I tried numerous times on, Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and on my phone. It won't work. When looking at the top right it says my account name "Nymphaea" but the icon has a question mark on it.

replies.body: Give it a try now, and make sure to [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) as well. Keep in mind that you need to be signed in to your **PBE Account** and not this one to be able to post on those boards. The account you're signed into now is your Live NA Account, not your PBE.
